original: intros P Q x y Hloc HlocP. destruct Hloc as [delta Hdelta]. destruct HlocP as [deltaP HdeltaP]. exists (Rmin delta deltaP). intros u v Hu Hv. apply Hdelta. - apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := Rabs (u - x)). + apply Rmin_l. + auto. - apply HdeltaP. + apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := Rabs (u - x)). * apply Rmin_r. * auto. + apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := Rabs (v - y)). * apply Rmin_r. * auto.
